text:
Pertama kali datang dan masuk ke villa nya langsung kaget dengan luas dana interior nya.. Kamar tidur pun ada 4 dan luas berserta kamar mandi di tiap kamar.. Dan 2 shower di tiap2 kamar mandi lho,
Untuk kolam renang pun luas beserta jacuzzi air hangat mantap pokok nya... Patut dicoba beserta keluarga karena villa
title: Recomended villa's

text: Tempat yang mengesankan, dengan suasana nyaman, tenang dan serasa di rumah. Sangat cocok untuk tempat kumpul keluarga atau teman2, karena konsep yang begitu ideal dengan dilengkapi ruang keluarga, dapur, kolam renang, dan kamar disekelilingnya sehingga benar2 merasakan kebersamaan dalam satu atap, konsep yg luar biasa.. bravo Akasha, luv it..
title: villa yang nyaman dan cocok untuk acara berkumpul keluarga atau teman teman

text:
Keluarga saya menghabiskan satu minggu di sana saat Desember 2012. Kami akan kembali karena pelayanannya, vila yang indah, dekat dengan pantai buatan, ini membuat liburan yang mengagumkan untuk kami. Saya sangat merekomendasikan untuk pergi ke sana.

Kevin
title: Servis yang dia atas rata-rata, vila yang indah, lokasi yang bagus,

text: Apa yang paling saya sukai adalah lokasi dan ruangan vila yang luas yang mereka sediakan. Ini dekat dengan pantai dan lokasi utama baru seperti klub pantai mozaic. Kualitas vila seperti apa yang saya harapkan. Pegawai yang bersahabat. Secara keseluruhan sangat puas dan akan kembali datang pastinya.
title: Menikmati itu

text:
Saya menyenangkan diri saya 4 malam di sini pada awal Oktober. Ketika saya sampai di sana saya tidak dapat percaya seberapa luas kamar yang saya dapat. Bahkan tanpa ranjang tambahan, itu sudah lebih dari cukup. Area tamu dan makannya sekitar 12 kaki dari 30 kaki termasuk televisi layar datar, area sofa untuk 10 orang, meja makan untuk 8 orang, dapur yang luas, pintu geser kaca yang dapat melihat langsung ke kolam saya, dan dek dengan area taman di satu sisinya.
Kamar tidur utamanya merupakan bangunan terpisah yang berukuran luas sekitar 15 x 25. Kedua bangunan memiliki lantai marmer dan kayu gelap sebaliknya, kecuali dinding dan beberapa perabotan. Kamar tidur saya juga memiliki pintu geser kaca yang dapat melihat langsung ke kolam. Kamar mandinya besar sekali dengan bak mandi marmer yang besar, ruangan kaca air pancuran yang besar, dan air pancuran di luar ruangan yang tidak saya gunakan. Terdapat 2 wastafel, dan lainnya.
Sarapan pagi disediakan untuk saya di dapur sesuai dengan permintaan saya dan banyak sekali. Di samping apa yang saya minta, terdapat satu piring penuh buah yang lebih dari yang bisa saya habiskan. Pegawai kebersihan merawat segalanya termasuk kolam dan dek setiap hari. Kolam tersebut memiliki semacam sistem filtrasi dan menyala saat malam serta menjaga suhunya tetap dingin saat siang hari dan hangat saat malam hari. Lokasinya mengagumkan kecuali Anda ingin berada di pusat berbagai hal. Pantai Batu Belig dapat ditempuh hanya dengan 5 menit di jalan dan di pantai tersebut terdapat Bar Mozaic Beach Club yang baru buka. Di sepanjang Jalan Batu Belig terdapat beberapa restoran yang layak . Ini merupakan tempat yang sunyi namun tidak jauh dari kehidupan malam Seminyak jika menggunakan taksi.
Tambahan pelayanannya adalah gratis layanan ke bandara.
Satu hal yang saya sesali adalah saya lupa menggunakan sarana olahraganya.
title: Menenangkan, sunyi, pelayanan yang baik, dan fasilitas yang bagus

text: An average place to spend the night. A luxury place for a business person. Wonderful ambience and tasty dinner. Looking forward for more such stays here. As name suggests, location is not as prior. More technical details need to be ascertained
title: Average

text:
We booked the ocean view suite and when we arrived, we found out that large construction site had recently started between the resort and the ocean, although the apartment was large with outside bath and shower. I felt that the construction site spoilt the view and was not what I expected to see outside our window (it was our honeymoon after all). We brought this concern to the resort manager who promptly offered us an upgrade to a residence in a different building, to make sure that we were happy with where we spent our days in Seminiak. The new accommodation was a 3 single roomed (we were given the choice of one of them) apartments with an adjoining living space and kitchenette, it was overlooking the beautiful private pool and was very nicely decorated. The level of service and hospitality of the Akasha Resort staff was beyond great, they were very helpful and accommodating to all of our requests, brought us and set up breakfast every morning (catering for my dietary needs) and generally went above and beyond to make our stay very memorable.

Would we stay again. 
YES. Definitely.
title: Our Honeymoon stay in Akasha Luxury Vila’s and Boutiques

text: We loved everything about this place . We stayed here for 6 nights. Stunning villa. Pool was beautiful, clean and tidy.  Great location. Close  to the beach and to all  famous restaurants and bars. The staff was the  best! Always smiling and friendly. Kadek made our stay even  better. She will help   you with everything you need.We really enjoyed our stay and will be back for sure!
title: Exceptional

owner_response.text:
Dear Neiraa1991
Thank you for your your kind review. We are delighted to have you and Looking forward to see you again in the future :)
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
We loved our stay in the junior sea view suite, gorgeous room, really attentive butlers, we booked in room massages, very reasonably priced, even cheaper then some we saw outside, and very good. The place is beautiful, you can order floating "instagram" breakfast and floaties which is fun. 2 minute walk to the beach and away from the hustle and bustle, still very convenient located. Double stars for the service. They send my stuff I forgot in the room after checking out to Ubud by courier, got it the same day. 
Best stay in Bali so far.
title: Excellent services and beautiful place

owner_response.text: Hi Valeggua, Thank you for your review, we are glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Please do let us know in the future should you need any help and inquiry. Hope to see u again :)
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

locations.name: The Akasha Luxury Villas & Boutique Hotel

text:
We stayed at the Akasha for 4 nights. It is a quaint little boutique hotel on the outskirts on Seminyak/Canggu. The hotel is clean and quiet, friendly staff and comfortable rooms. 
The pool was small and not great to share with other guests as it’s quite intimate. The location is quiet and away from most things so taxis are a must to get around.
title: Boutique hotel out of town

owner_response.text: Dear lelulu2266, Thank you for your feedback, we are happy that you liked our rooms and staff. Sorry to hear that you need taxi to get around, we apologized that perhaps you were not well informed that we are 200 meters from the beach and we provide shuttle to the beach with direct access to W hotel's woo bar, and further you can walk by the beach to Potato Head beach club, also the new Cafe Del Mar on the northern side and Fins beach club. We are encouraging our guest to enjoy stroll along the beach as it is beautiful and no hassle in facing traffic. Do please contact us in the future should you need help or inquiries. We look forward to seeing you again.
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: Staff were very helpful and are there 24/7 ready for any request. They researched a bakery and had GF bread delivered to my room that day. They were great at advising on estimated costs for taxi's and any general questions on the area. I  had a few issues with their online booking system from Australia, it's not the easiest to understand but they did clarify things over email and were happy to change the booking. I sent updated flight details for our transfers however this was lost and our driver wasn't there to collect us at the airport but they came instantly once we called them, they were very apologetic - suggest clarifying date and time of transfers before leaving home destination. We look forward going back to this place again. Location was great, the breakfasts were beautiful, and staff were very friendly. The pools don't have safety gates around them so you have to watch the kids, however bringing a 5 year old with us was fine.
title: Great Staff and very relaxing

owner_response.text:
Dear 623hayleyc
Thank you very much for your feedback. We are glad that you enjoyed our location and property. We sincerely apologize for the issues on booking system and glad we could help you with that. Also with the driver pick up, glad that it can be resolved at best possible time frame. We surely look forward to seeing you and serving u again in the future. Best Regards
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Great little Boutique hotel that had lovely rooms and helpful staff. Airport pick up was also a bonus, for a reasonable charge. We liked our room and the decor, very quite and comfortable beds. It is located on the edge of Seminyak so a taxi is required at night. The Potato Beach club is very near and well worth a visit.
The things that let this hotel down were its grey (should have been white towels) and the bed linen which was not pristine! Also the breakfast selection was limited, cornflakes or coco pops, no healthy cereal. You could however eat it outside your room.
I would have liked to rate this hotel higher as it was very pleasant.
title: good value, stylish boutique hotel

text: I stayed at every luxury resort in Ubud but Akasha has a special place in my heart. Amazing hotel, great location, very tasteful interior design, perfect service. This time, especially Kadek at front desk was very helpful. Thank you, see you next year
title: A-MA-ZING

text: We booked a stay over the weekend. The apartment was spacious and clean. Gym and pool was right at our doorstep. Plenty of food and massage establishments within walking distance. Highly recommended!!
title: Relaxing weekend getaway

owner_response.text:
Dear lowy0047
We are glad you like our apartment suite, it is very recommended from a small group as it can fit 6 people. Happy to welcome you and lookiing forward if we can see you again in the future. Warmest regards
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Me and my wife stay in this amazing villa! the reception staff are just fabulous! they are going beyond to help us in everything we need during our stay. 
The villa itself is really spacious and clean. 
Apart from that the location is just perfect between seminyak and canggu which is really convenience.
Needless to say, we absolutely love our stay and definitely will be back again for our next holiday at The Akasha Villas!
title: Marvelous stay!!

text:
The key to luxury is making the guest feel comfort and elegance. Unfortunately the processes that dictate the way this hotel operates does not take the guest experience into consideration at all. Regardless of whether you're dealing with management or front line workers you'll be guaranteed poor  service and be left feeling underwhelmed, dishonest and uncomfortable at best.

Until there is a complete overhaul of the way the hotel operates on a day to day basis, I strongly recommend you do not stay at this hotel. There are many others in the same vicinity which provide far better service.
title: Service far from luxury

owner_response.text:
Dear TravelLoverKay
We are sorry to hear your unpleasant experience. As explained in previous review, we regret that there was banking issue during your stay at Akasha resulting in unsuccessful payment on our side. We do try to review this process so that there will be no further issue in the future. Please do consider our sincere apology, should you ever come to Bali please do contact us for special treatment to make up for the inconvenience
Best Regards
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Booking at this “luxury” accommodation was a mistake. It was very difficult to sleep because the bedroom is right on a highway. The spa was unusable because it was so dirty. The staff there were rude and unfriendly. 
When I checked in the internet dropped out in the reception area. This resulted in the money being debuted from my account and the hotel claiming they did not receive the funds. My internet banking transaction list and a call to the bank confirmed the transaction was successful. The hotel staff kept demanding I pay again. This was very upsetting and because the staff spoke little English it was very difficult to communicate. In the end I was forced the pay again. I had to cancel my credit card so the bank would reverse the transaction. I was then left with no credit card for the rest of the trip.
title: Regret booking in this villa

owner_response.text:
Dear LeighOI
We are very sorry you had an unpleasant experience with us. We do regret that there was a banking connection problem that created your payment unsuccessful on our side. This is very rare and to be honest the first time we experienced it. We have communicated regarding this to relevant departments to resolve the problem. Regarding the noise in your bedroom we do take note of it and immediately close the room for sealing the windows which might have sound transmittion
We apologize once again for the inconvenience, should you be considering to come to Bali please do let us know, we will try to make up for this with special conditions for your stay
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
We stayed at this beautiful resort for 5 days, the staff are very friendly and keep our villa very tidy daily. The variety of breakfasts they offered are delicious, we recommend the Indonesian fried rice and the Indonesian porridge!
Only suggestion would be to fix the shower head and the toilet as it does shows signs of usage.
Everything else is perfect, highly recommended! :)
title: Beautiful villa resort!

locations.name: The Akasha Luxury Villas & Boutique Hotel

text:
We were first time travellers to Bali with two teenagers and wanted to have space, private pool, and be near the beach in Seminyak. The Akasha ticked all the boxes. the villas have a main living/lounge/kitchen area and separate bedrooms all sitting around the pool and spa. There’s a mini mart within in 1min walk to stock up on food and drinks and brilliant breakfast/dinner options close by. With both indoor and outdoor showers it is truely a tropical paradise. Our holiday was about relaxing sit by the pool and listening to music through the amazing blue tooth speakers in the villa. There was also a gorgeous pergola welcoming all for an afternoon nap.
Villa was clean, staff were excellent and there was even a driver to take us into town if we felt like going.
True bliss and very highly recommended!
title: The Akasha Luxury Villas deliver the goods

owner_response.text:
Dear Lucyrasdell
Thank you for your lovely feedback. We are very delighted to hear you had a wonderful stay at our villa. We are glad you liked our location which is just by walk to the beach. We will continue to upgrade our villa to meet our guest need. We would be very happy should we be able to welcome you again in the future. Please do contact us directly for any inquiry or assistance.
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: Beautiful place. The staff is very frivolous and helpful. At this hotel we did not have a problem. The management of the hotel did not have the problem of prolonging the room. The rooms are beautiful, large and clean. The breakfast in the hotel was perfect. We will surely be happy to return.
title: Jana

text:
My wife and I stayed in the Traditional Ethnic hotel room and we had a wonderful stay! The room was very spacious and comfortable, with all basic necessities provided. 
The shared pool was nice to cool down during those hot summer days. 

We really liked the location! The Akasha is very strategically located between Seminyak and Canggu (approx 5 mins by motorbike either way). 
The Batu Belig beach is only 200m away (707 Beachberm is great to enjoy the sunsets). Restaurants such as Watercress, Hog's Wild and Cabina are within walking distance as well. 

Highly recommended!
title: Wonderful stay at the Akasha Boutique Hotel!

text:
We stayed in one of the four boutique style hotelrooms, which was beautiful, spacious and clean. The pool is small but nice and quiet since there are only 4 hotel rooms (the villas have their own pool). Staff is very friendly and helpful. I mentioned the lock on our door was a bit hard to handle, and they quickly had it fixed. They have a car service that (when available) will take you anywhere within the Seminyak area. 
Location is great! The beach is right next to it, and from there we walked to Finns beach club, the W hotel and Potatohead. There are also a few cute bars/warungs right on the beach, which were great for a cheap meal or a beer at sunset. By car/scooter both Seminyak and Canggu were just a short drive. We rented a scooter which is the quickest way to get around (if you’re not intimidated by the Bali traffic..).
We really enjoyed our stay at Akasha and would stay there again!
title: Great stay!

text:
Spent a long weekend here with my family at one of the three bedroom villas. Stayed in Villa 10.  

The villas are well kept, spacious, very comfortable and the swimming pool is a very good size for the whole family. The living and dining areas are large and can be closed off if you want to relax in the evening with some air conditioning. Bedrooms/bathrooms/outdoor showers are also of a very good size and high quality furnishing. 

Service from ALL the staff was excellent. We found them to be very responsive and always adopting a "can do" attitude to all our requests, even considering we traveled during a busy period. 

The location is literally 2 mins walk to the beach and you can walk about 10 mins along the beach to get to the W hotel and Potato Head etc. Plenty of good restaurants around Petitenget and nice to be away from the intense hustle and bustle of Seminyak center. 

There were some minor works going on at the resort and nearby but disturbance was negligible. The vast majority of the time you would not know any works or construction were actually happening. 

I would definitely recommend a stay here to groups and/or families.
title: Great Villas, Service & Location

owner_response.text: Thank you for your review, we are happy to hear you had a good experience despite of some renovation at our property. We are glad to inform you that our renovation has completely finish and you can enjoy our new look of reception building as well as our new boutique hotel. Looking forward to see you again in the future
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Although there was some renovation taking place at the entrance, the villa was stunning and the best value for money.
Two stunning bedroom suites, a large spacious and luxurious sitting room/dining room/kitchen... all of which looked over a marvelous pool with waterfall, surrounded by fragrant trees and plants.
The service was second to none and the breakfast very good.
I little bit out of Seminyak town, but the free shuttle service was always on hand and it was easy getting back via taxi.
Will definitely stay again.
title: A long weekend at Akasha

text:
I spent a long weekend at the villas. We were 2 people and stayed in a 4 bedroom villa as they did not have any smaller ones available - huge place!
The location is perfect, just in the middle of everything with close access to the beach - awesome for a morning run!
The public area was under renovation, so reception and Gym was not accessible at that time. 
The Villas is huge and nicely done, but definitely very used and they did not much to maintain them. You can see that the owner does not invest much in that place, you can see that is was a glorious property in the past, but the best years are over. The staff is friendly and they always try to help and to arrange whatever is needed. Breakfast was prepared by the villa butler in the villa's kitchen. Very limited choice of course and quality was ok. Overall enjoyable.
The villas a great to just lay low and do nothing. Even though it is not the newest property, it was a great stay and very relaxing.
title: Lovely but the love is missing

text:
Thank you Tadek for all of your warm assistance and the best breakfast in Bali. The villa is beautiful, and we really appreciated all of your help and fantastic service. Nothing was too much trouble.

We will definitely be back!
title: Wonderful stay

owner_response.text:
Dear Anne-Marie

We are delighted to receive such a wonderful review !
Our team strive to welcome our guests from all around the world as if they are in their home away from home and we are glad that you have enjoyed your stay !

We hope to Welcome you for your next visit to Bali

Warm Regards
Gustu
General Manager
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: This has been my 4th stay here and it has been wonderful. The staffs are friendly and extremely attentive and accommodative. Rooms are big and I love that the living room is closed so the Mozzies are kept out. Plus it's only a 2 min walk to the beach! I'll definitely be back again. Thanks for the pleasant stay, Akasha!
title: A great place to unwind, relax and rejuvenate

text: Stayed with my girl friends at Akasha Villas for 4 nights on August. This villa is located between canggu and seminyak. The public beach is nearby as well as a mini mart across the street. The hog wild bbq restaurant is walking distance from villa as well as some spas and boutique shops. The villa was well maintained and cleaned everyday. Our rooms and bathrooms were spacious enough with adequate closet space and bathroom hooks and shelves. We always came home to cool, clean and turned down beds. I love the attentiveness of the staff. All our requests were attended to with a smile. They were discreet and always courteous. They made our stay very comfortable. The breakfast was ok and generous. We tried American breakfast and the nasi goreng. If you like your breakfast warm you should specify a time when you'll really get up and come out so you can appreciate it better. Otherwise the staff will go ahead and prepare them for you and leave on table. As we were a group of 7 it was understandable how they had to prepare in advance and it would get cold by the time we came out. We also tried the in-house spa and also had them call us a spa service from outside once the inhouse was closed. Both were ok, the in house was a bit better. We had our own transport service available for us so we didn't get to try their transport. On our last day we had them prepare for us a seafood bbq in the villa, they even decorated the pool and attended to all our requests. Highly recommend this place and would gladly stay here again.
title: Great place to stay for a big group!

text:
Been here few times and the excitement never less. The great feeling being here always like first time.
The staffs are friendly and helpful. Services are good. Villa facilities are in good condition. Rooms are spacious
title: Always nice

text:
Good things first: Staff is very friendly and helfpful. They make a great job in supporting whatever your plans or wishes are and act quickly, always with a smile. The location is also on the upside if you want to be very near to a beach. The garden was lush and the villas and rooms are quiet spacious.
On the downside: Forget "luxury". The villas show their age and the wear and tear of interiors and furniture is considerable. The everyday cleaning helped, but still, it needs refurbishing. The compound also is of average tidiness with scooters, cars, trashbins etc. decorating the walkways. Due to construction works at the entrance-building there was no lobby / reception desk and no gym. This could have been announced and a discount would have seemed appropriate. Our villa was adjacent to a wall right next to Jl. Batu Belig - a day and night very noisy street. Noisy neighbours (within the compound...) can also make it difficult to find privacy.
So all in all: we had a good time and it was enjoyable but the Akasha Villas do not fully live up to their promise and price.
title: Lovely staff, good location - not "luxury"

text: Stayed here last minute for one night. Very beautiful and clean villas. Freshly cut fruit in the morning readily prepared. Would definitely  recommend for visitors, couples, families and groups of friends
title: Lovely

text:
The villas are a great size and very comfortable. Pool is perfect and it's a lovely retreat in busy Seminyak. The location is good as it's 2-3 minutes walk to the beach and 10 minutes a taxi to the Seminyak village area with all of the shopping, bars and restaurants. There are also plenty of options within walking distance of the villas including cafes and spas. 
I really need to share how helpful the staff are. Nothing is a problem and anything that needed to be done was done quickly and carefully. They are a real credit to the villas and made our stay very special.
title: Lovely villas with pools.

text: Recently stayed in 3 bedroom villa for 2 weeks and totally enjoyed the thoughtfully designed villa with large sun drenched pool. The location is ideal,as on Batu Belig and conveniently positioned between Seminyak and Canggu and a short walk to the beach close to 707 and other venues. Staff are most attentive and discreet. Would highly recommend.
title: Perfect location and beautiful villas

owner_response.text:
Dear Craig W P

Thank you for your feedback on our hotel, its location and especially our team !
We are glad that you had enjoyed our villa, also our proximity which is just by the beach. We continue to try to improve our villa, and we are excited to show you our lobby and common area renovation which will be done by early next year

Hope we can see you again on your next visit to Bali

Yours sincerely,
Gustu
Villa Manager
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: Its a really good place to stay for family vacation. The staffs are very kind and very fast in responding our request😀 but, some improvement needed in breakfast and room service (kitchen ). The location is also near the beach and mini market, the villas also provides transportation to drop us off to restaurant nearby.
title: Excellent!

owner_response.text:
Dear Errine H,

Thank you very much for giving us Excellent review and also for your loyalty. 
It is always a pleasure to have you among us. Your positive feedback are valuable and we have made some improvement especially for breakfast and also room service menu. Our F&B team now have some new creation menus for our beloved guests.
We much appreciate all valuable feedback for us to keep and always provide highest standard.  

We look forward to welcoming back soon.
Thank you and have a nice day.
Best regards,
Akasha Bali Management
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
This was my first time stay in this villa. We  are groups of 12 (8 adult & 4 kids). So we booked the 4 rooms villa and they gave us the no.1 Villa an it was great an we loved it! 
Spacious living room connecting with the kitchen. 1 big pool and 1 outdoor jacuzzi with hot water. 1 outdoor gazebo to enjoy the massage and lying down. 
The master bedroom located at the 2nd floor, and the others room are besides the pool. All the bathrooms are outdoor concepts with bathtub inside. 
The staff are very friendly and helpful. Very fast respond if you need something in your villa. They also provide room service menus, spa and also transport. 
The villa include the breakfast for 8 persons and you can choose either Western or Indonesian menu. They ask you everyday which one you want and what time you want to enjoy the breakfast. 
All the rooms are spacious enough and clean. Its all located in about 600-700m squares area. 
Across the villa there's a minimarket that open 24 hours. Batu Belig (Seminyak) public beach is just 5 minutes walk. The famous Hogwild Ribs are also 5 minutes walk. We really loved the area because its really nearby the centre of Seminyak Area.
Really loved this villa and all the staffs! Reccomended Villa if you like to stay at Seminyak Area
title: Nice Villa with perfect location in Seminyak Area

owner_response.text:
Dear Steven S,

Thank you very much for giving us great review.
It is always a pleasure to have you among us.  We love to hear that you much like our villa and it facility. All villas have become favorites for each guests during stay. We much appreciate all valuable feedback for us to keep and always provide highest standard.  
We look forward to welcoming back soon.

Thank you and have a nice day.

Best regards,
Akasha Bali Management
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: The villa is huge - the pool is decent sized where our kids enjoyed themselves very much. The staff is extremely friendly. They even granted us a late check out till 630pm as we had a night flight to catch.
title: Awesome villa

text: We stayed here for 4 nights and was blown away by the size of the villa! The living and bed rooms were separated by a pool and garden! Service was excellent and while it was slightly off the main street, they provided a free ride to nearby places. Overall a great stay!
title: Great place to stay

locations.name: The Akasha Luxury Villas & Boutique Hotel

text: Amazing property and very sweet staff!!! We really enjoyed our stay!! They have a taxi, laundry, and in house massage services toooo!! The staff is really helpful and gives good advice about Bali and things to see!! Ask for pamphlets!!
title: Akasha Villas Stay

text: We are staying at Akasha Villas as we have a wedding to attended nearby. The villa is immaculate, the pool and spa are gorgeous. Staff have been helpful since check in and beautiful and friendly. Great location too, heaps of really nice places to eat and boutiques to shop in very close by. Would definitely stay again!
title: Beautiful villa, beautiful staff

text:
Great Location and Clean.
Nice private pool..
Nice staff and polite..
Not many food breakfast's choice.. 
Taste of food is too lousy compare even to 3 star hotel..
Hot water in private Jacuzzy did not work..
title: Nice location but poor facility

text: We stayed in 2 bedrooms villa and everything is fabulous! from hotel staff to facilities. It was a wonderful stay for our family. Staff were very attentive and willing to help with everything we needed. The hotel is very close to the beach, only 2 minutes walk. Breakfast was nice too! As for dinner, I would like to recommend the BBQ at villa! It was really good! Staff were cooking, grilling, and preparing everything in our villa. All in all, I can't recommend this place enough. I will definitely come back to stay in the Akasha villa again :)
title: The perfect place for everyone!

owner_response.text:
Dear lita72761,
Thank you for giving us a perfect rating and recommending our villas to other travelers. We are very pleased to hear that our staff made your stay pleasant. Our entire staff are very much enjoyed catering to your needs as much as you enjoyed your stay.
We definitely looking forward to welcoming you again at your home in  Seminyak Bali at The Akasha Villas.

Wish you a lovely day.

Best regards,
Akasha team
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

The Akasha Luxury Villas & Boutique Hotel

text:
We stayed in a four bedroom villa and had a wonderful stay. 

Pros:
- The villa was very nice and comfortable - each room was roomy and the swimming pool, while small (not big enough to do laps), was nice for relaxing.
- One major plus point was that the living and dining area is indoors (unlike a lot of villas in Bali where they are outdoors). It allows you to open the doors so you can overlook the pool area, but if its rainy/hot, you can close the doors and turn on the aircon.
- The service was great and the free twice daily shuttle was a nice touch.

Cons:
- Communication could be improved prior to and upon checking in as we had different people arriving at different times and was trying to arrange with the villa regarding check in and transportation. We received a few conflicting responses and had to clarify them again. 

All in all, I would come back to stay at Akasha Villas again.
title: Great villa for family and friends

text:
Pros
The villa is nice and big and as good as the photos in the website, staff were helpful, massage is good, and you can request for checkout in the villa itself (instead of walking to lobby) if payment is by cash. 

Cons
The place was full of mosquitoes. The staff were very helpful and will spray the rooms with insecticide and fog the area but it doesnt seem to deter mosquitoes. We left the place with about 15 mozzie bites on each of us (thats about 90 bites for 6 pax). 

There were roadworks on the pedestrian pavement outside the hotel and alot of drain covers were left uncovered and this is dangerous for elderly n young children. Batu belig beach is quite littered with rubbish. As there were not much shops in the surrouding area, had to take cab everywhere we go and we ended up stuck in traffic.  

In short, this place is great if u plan to stay inside the villa (arm yourself with mozzie repellents) and relax all day, but not so good if you plan to walk out or travel out everyday as it is far from everything else.
title: Mosquitoes

text:
3 years ago in 2013, I booked the 4-BR villa where my parents and sisters stayed with us for a family vacation. The property was new, immaculate, and fresh. Everything was right about it and we had such a great stay. It had all the potential to be a serious contender in the Seminyak area

Fast forward to 2016, now with a young toddler in tow, we decided to stay at Akasha again for old times sake. With such wonderful memories from our previous stay, this was surely a no-brainer right? I was wrong

1) It all started when I tried emailing them for an airport pick-up. Numerous times but all emails bounced back. Naturally I tried calling them as well, but nobody answered the phone. I'm not exaggerating when I say that I tried at least 20 times. I've a bad feeling at this point already

2) When we arrived at the villa (#11), we were greeted by a very dusty floor. To my dismay, the villa looked extremely tired and lacked maintenance. A far cry from what I remembered. Sofa cushions look like it went through hell, rooms smell of musky old wood which reminds me of my late grandmother's house (bless her soul), pool water looks murky and wires of lighting were exposed, wooden floor outdoors has seen better days, and the living room lighting for some reason was so dim we could barely see anything at night

3) Mosquitoes, mosquitoes, mosquitoes galore. The property was infested with so many mosquitoes that all I remember doing every evening was lighting up mosquito coils to ward them off. I've a toddler with us and as any parent would understand, getting pesky mosquito bites is something we want to avoid at all cost. The Balinese people may have evolved and developed some immunity to mosquitoes, but we've not and it made staying in the villa that much more uncomfortable. Doesn't help matters with the recent Zika problem we're facing too! 

Yes, I could say that the service staff were friendly and helpful. But that's the very basic expectation for anyone paying good money to stay in such a property. Let alone in the highly competitive Kuta-Legian-Seminyak stretch. So I don't think that's a point to even discuss or commend on

This is not a rant. This is a PSA which I felt compelled to write. I'm not asking for an explanation nor any compensation from the Akasha management. This is for fellow travelers who may be considering Akasha to have an informed decision.
title: So much potential.... but a victim of poor management

owner_response.text:
Dear LeeJT,

Regret to read your review and apologize your recent stay with us was not meet to your expectation.

So sorry regarding your request airport transfer. We did not receive your email. But our butler have arranged your airport pick up after you successfully called directly to our villa. This is normal happened as mostly all emails are responded immediately. We afraid that you sent the email to your agent whom you booked your room and was not forwarded to us. So far we do not have problem with email. 
As we have explained to you before that all phones line in Seminyak area faced trouble due to changes of wires installation from Telecom. We have sent notification to all agent partners and post on Akasha Facebook for new phone line as a backup. Please be informed our phone line has back normal again.

With regard to cleanliness for the villa, we have briefed our team to give more intention to every villas details and make sure all villas always tidy and  cleaned.
Your feedback also has been shared and bring to management meeting. Our management continuously doing an upgrade our facilities and also review pest control vendor. We have addressed serious complaint. Please be informed that we are doing regular treatment in every villas except if the guests do not allowed us to do treatment inside of privacy villa during their stay. But we did provide them with mosquito repellent.
So far we did not found mosquito challenges in other villas recently even though we faced rainy season.

Thank you very much for your feedback. Wish you a pleasant day.

Best regards,
Akasha Bali Management

text:
3아이들과 3 가족이 여행했습니다. 
풀빌라를 선택할 때 가장먼저 안전한 곳을 찾았었는데요. 이곳은 방이 풀을 둘러싸고 있고 
거실에서 풀장으로 갈때는 문이 있어서 어린아이들이 혹시나 못보는 사이에 나가는 것이 가장 걱정이었는데 이 부분에서 안전해서 가장 마음에 들었습니다. 
거실도 넓고 부엌도 넓고 식탁도 넓어서 좋은데 넓은것에 비해서 에어컨이 작아 그부분은 조금 아쉬웠어요 하지만 아주 더운편은 아니었습니다. 
와이파이는 연결상태가 안좋을때도 있었지만 곧바로 수리해주고 속도도 매우 빠른편이어서 좋았습니다. 
아침식사는 식당으로 갈 필요없이 전날 주문하면 되고요 시간도 정해놓으면 스텝들이 와서 세팅하 주고 다 먹은 후에는 설기지도 다 해주어서 너무 편했습니다. 
아이들과 어른 여섯명이 놀기에도 충분한 풀장크와 방고 넓찍해서 매우 만족스러웠습니다 
한가지 아쉬운 점은 거실에 화장실이 없어 화장실 갈려면 방으로 가야한다는 점이 좀 불편했다고 할수있겠네요. 
하지만 스텝들이 매우 친절하고 아기들도 예뻐해서 기분이 좋았고 유명한 식당인 누리스와룽과도 가까워서 더 좋았어요. 
다시 발리에간다면 다시 묵고싶은 숙소입니다 ! 

We stayed 2 nights with 3 families with 3kids.

text:
This was our 3rd time staying at the Akasha Villas and similar to our 1st holiday, it was perfect once again!

The 2 bedroom pool villa was amazing - very clean, spacious, great size pool!

Thank you Akasha for a wonderful vacation - we will be back again!

text:
We stayed at the Akasha villas in April 2016 .This was our first visit to Bali ... 

It was EXCELLENT!!!! The rooms were clean and extremely functional The beds were sooo comfortable and the bathroom and shower areas were brilliant too 

All rooms were air conditioned and with fans 

The private pool was just gorgeous !!!the kids just loved it 

The staff was excellent .. We had breakfast made in our villa every morning ...we also had access to a driver at any time ... There was an excellent babysitting service .. No request for advice or help was too much .. The staff were extremely helpful at all hours 

We were close to local restaurants, shopping and the beach 

We would HIGHLY recommend these villas .. We would have absolutely no hesitation in coming back here .. It was brilliant !!
title: Excellent Villa and service

text:
Awesome villas. This property has everything that you need to have for a perfect family getaway in bali. Huge living area with dinning and kitchen. A BIG swimming pool and a great jacuzzi. Awesome rooms and bathing area. 

And yes a relaxing balinese massage taking out  all the fatigue after a hot day on the bali streets.

I would recommend everyone travelling in a group to opt for this property.
title: Super experience

text:
Don't judge a book by its cover. This holds so true for Akasha. When u enter the property well you might have doubts whether you made the right choice buy as soon as you enter your villa BANG you know this is a dream place to spend the last 3 days of the trip.

The staff in the hotel is top class. Personal butler for breakfast cooking in your private villa kitchen while u are in the jacuzzi what can i say. Simply living your life king size.

Massive kitchen dining area and tv area. Amazing swimming pool. A spa area outdoors. 

Oh i forgot to mention we got a free upgrade from a 2 bedroom to a 4 bedroom villa. Massive rooms and bathrooms. One master bedroom which is to die for. Outdoor bathing area in all bath rooms bathtubs and indoor shower as well.

I would recommend groups families and friends to stay in this property with out a doubt.

Simply loved it.
title: Breathtaking!

text:
What a fantastic property it is....
One of the best..
There villas just made our trip..
We had booked 2bedroom villa but they upgraded us to 4bedroom villa with a private butler... the villa is like a dream house... the best part is the staff is super friendly n nice... one of the best properties in bali for sure.... highly recommended....i like their breakfast idea..the butler come to ur villa kitchen n cook infront of u....
title: Awesome

text:
SERVICE
Great service - staff were generally friendly, helpful and happy to help. Very prompt with fulfilling our requests. 

VILLA
Villa was nice and big (we got upgraded to a three bedroom villa even though we booked a two bedroom). 

The pool was a good size and very inviting esp after walking about on a hot afternoon. 

Villa garden was very lush and full of birds chirping away at all hours. 

LOCATION
Villas were pretty close to the beach- just a couple hundred metres. 

W Hotel and Potato Head are about ten to fifteen minutes from the villa if walking via the beach. 

SHUTTLE SERVICE
Villa is located away from the hustle and bustle of Seminyak. 

But free shuttle services to Seminyak were also provided. 

Would come back.

text: Had a nice stay at Villa 9. Service was good, esp from our butler, Lina. In-villa massages were a great convenience, as were the shuttle service to Seminyak village and the room service. Had a lovely holiday.

locations.name: The Akasha Luxury Villas & Boutique Hotel

text:
Had a short trip and stayed at the 4 bedroom private villa which included a large pool and jacuzzi. The rooms were well presented complete with complimentary breakfast cooked in our own kitchen and eaten within a large dining area. 

The reception staff were very friendly on arrival and throughout the entire trip. The manager of the resort came to visit to ask how the service was which was very comforting.

Would highly recommend this resort to anyone travelling to Seminyak in the near future!
title: Great getaway from reality

text: Stayed in the 4 bedroom villa with friends. Pool and jacuzzi were well maintained and large. Very spacious areas to hang out and relax. Bedrooms themselves and other facilities were good. Reception staff were very helpful and friendly (right down to acquiring some late night fried chicken from down the street for us). WiFi was reliable. No complaints from our week stay here.
title: Excellent large Villa

text:
Beautiful and spacious villas located a stones throw from the beach.

From the moment we arrived until we left we felt very well taken cared of and relaxed. The staff went out of their way at every turn to make us comfortable and had a friendly greeting and a smile ready at all times. They organized excursions and were available to assist us with any kind of question or issue we had during our stay. There is also a very convenient shuttle service offered which takes you anywhere you feel like going around the area.

The location itself was great for our needs, very close (2 min walk) to the beach which was perfect for a morning run or for watching the sunset in the evenings at any one of the bars and restaurants that could be found down there. Batu belig beach is relatively free of beach sellers also which was a bit relaxing.

We rented the two bedroom villa which was very nice and styled in a modern Balinese style. There was a private pool with overhanging frangipani trees that smelled wonderful. Every morning one of the staff would prepare breakfast for us at the villa according to our wishes which was a great start to the day.

In short we loved our stay at the Akasha villas and will definitely return next time we're in the island :-)

Will add some photos later if I'm able to edit this, but it's really really nice, warmly recommended.
title: A home away from home

text: There are loads of villas here in Seminyak but I'm so glad we booked Akasha. It was seamless from the get go, I booked directly and they responded swiftly each time. Upon arrival our driver was waiting for us at the airport and within 30 mins we've arrived and checked in. It was after 10.30 pm and Kadek has been most helpful in getting food delivered quite late in the evening. As for the villa, it's oh so spacious, clean, walking distance to the beach, close to shops and restaurants, has quality furnishings and the pool is superb. Breakfast cooked for us each morning is also a nice touch. We will certainly be back. Very soon I hope!
title: Ticked all the boxes

text: Stayed with friends in a amazing 4 bedroom villa,  with outdoor pool and jacuzzi.  Very clean and well maintained.  Staff were very helpful and attentive.  Fresh cooked breakfast in your villa each morning. Would most definitely stay again.
title: Excellent villas.

text:
We arrived on a Saturday evening and were greeted with a cool drink and a cold towel to cool down. This is certainly a first for me.

The villa was large with a good sized private pool, clean rooms, impressive bathrooms and a good dining area.

The best thing about this villa is the friendly staff who offered to pick up our late night suppers, order our takeaway and provide us information on where to go.

I will definitely stay at this place again on my next visit back to Bali.

text:
Stayed 9-12 Jan 2016 with friends.Not our first time staying in a balinese villa but all 7 of us are very impressed with the quality of our villa # 12 from the very first step into our villa. We booked a 4 bedroom villa for 7 of us and requested for birthday decoration for one of our friend's birthday celebration. The decoration provided was worth every single penny we paid extra. Our villa had three double bedrooms and one twin bedroom across two levels, huge dining and lounge area together with a great swimming pool in the middle, not forgetting the Jacuzzi at the roof top. All staff provided excellent service and gave good suggestions for our meals. Thumbs up for our butler Kadek. The shuttle service provided by Akasha was very helpful, dropped us at areas that we wanted to go which saved our hassle as we're travelling in a big group. Highly recommend. Will definitely come back again.

Stayed January 2016, travelled with family
title: Beautiful villa with fantastic staff

owner_response.text:
Dear Sherlee23,

Greetings from The Akasha Villas.  Thank you for fabulous review about our villas and staff, especially your compliment for our butler "Kadek". We are so grateful to know that our villa facilities and services made your stay enjoyable and meet you and your friends expectation. 
Your review has been shared to all team and we are looking forward to welcoming you again at The Akasha Villas in the near future.

Wish you a lovely day.

Thank you very much from
All staff The Akasha Villas
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
We have stayed at the Akasha Villas for 5 days (December 29th until January 2 of 2016). We were there with my family (4 adults and 4 children of 10 and 12). We had a luxury villa (4 bedrooms) with our own pool, rest beds etc ... The villa was the first at the entrance and unfortunately, it was noisy because of the motorcycles and scooters driving in the little street behind. The decoration of the villa was great, except the absence of venetian blind or blackout liner. For people who need darkness to sleep in the morning, it was a big lack and we could not rest as much as we would have liked. Another bad point : the villas are too far from the heart of Seminyak to go there by walk (and there are no pavement in some big portions of the roads) and the very bad traffic made our trips tiresome.   
Regarding the wi-fi connexion : to be improved (very very slow)
The service staff is very kind and cheerful; they all are efficient but we need to require them to do things (no initiative). The driver service is very helpful. 
So, to sump up, I would say that it is a nice place to stay but I prefer the villa in the heart of Seminyak where we stayed in 2014.
title: Good but can still be improved in some points

owner_response.text:
Dear Malvina_dupent

Warmest Greetings from The Akasha Villas. 
Thank you for reviewing our villas on Trip Advisor. Glad that you like our huge luxury 4 bedrooms pool villas including the Jacuzzi and private big swimming pool.
Apologize to learn that your quality sleep was interrupted. Your positive feedback regarding blackout liner is being review by our management. We will find the best solution and make sure our guests a comfortable sleep and stay. 

Our villa is located on Batu Belig road which are nearby restaurants and just 5 minutes walk to the beach.  For guests convenient, we do provide free shuttle services to Seminyak areas.  

Thank you for your feedback. We hope we will be able to host you again in the future. 

Have a lovely day

Best regards,
All Staff The Akasha
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: Our first time in Bali. Very impressed with the quality of our villa # 12 - rooms and living areas were impeccably prepared - and maintained to that standard daily. Our villa had four double bedrooms across two levels, huge dining and lounge area and great swimming pool (with rooftop jacuzzi). Perfect for our two families staying. Staff extremely attentive. Akasha positioning at the northern edge of Seminyak (adj Canggu) was actually a good move - walking distance to beach and just out of the high traffic area. Highly recommend.
title: Beautiful villa with great staff

text: We booked 4 bedrooms villa for 9 of us. The villa itself is beautiful, and spacious. The pool was great but it could have been better if the tiles were lighter in color. The jacuzzi was great, but it could have been better if it was a hot jacuzzi. The bedrooms were great. The staff was very prompt and friendly. Breakfast were freshly prepared every morning in our villa. Location wise is perfect. It's still within the Seminyak area (Petitenget), but more to the quieter side. It takes about 10 mins ride to the heart of Seminyak and 3 mins away from the upcoming and famous La Laguna beach club. The only downside was the WiFi. It was slow and we have to keep re-connecting to it. Otherwise it was a fabulous stay we had at Akasha Villa.

text: It was very unsatisfied to stay here. At first the air conditioner is not cold at all, so we ask the staff to fix it or we move to another villa. text: we recently stayed at nights in villa 8 at the akasha villas. it was a family holiday. my husband, I and our son 16 year old son whom bought a friend. we booked a 2 bedroom villa which was perfect for our stay. text: GORGEOUS!! We had a party of 5 adults and 2 young children. We stayed in a 4 bedroom villa with private pool and jacuzzi - it was exquisite!! Spacious, clean, staff eager to please. This place is huge and so inviting. Chef comes to your room and cooks your breakfast for you with different choices ie. Balinese brekky, American brekky, continental brekky.. Balinese was our favourite! You MUST do yourself a favour and stay in this villa at least once! TRULY 5 STAR and VIP!! We WILL be back!
title: Akasha Villas Seminyak

owner_response.text:
We are so happy and proud to receive your compliment. TRULY 5 STAR and VIP!! will always motivate Akasha team to explore highest service standard in hospitality. Our 4 Bedroom presidential villa feature 750 sqm in land size and completed with private swimming pool as well pool jacuzzi.
Thank you for an outstanding review given to our villas. We hope to welcoming again in the near future.

Wish you a great weekend.

Best regards,
Akasha team & Management.

text:
It was a good stay overall, appreciate the staff who were very considerate about giving guests privacy yet consistently keeping check of our daily breakfast preferences and timing. Stayed here at Villa 10 (the innermost villa) for 4D3N. Forgot they had shuttle service though - didn't manage to utilise the added service.

+/ 
Quiet area, no noise if you are looking to really relax!

Very courteous staff

Very little mosquitoes spotted! 

Breakfast was alright - tried both continental and american. 

-/
Can be a bit secluded when you travel back at night

It is not in a 'prime hot spot' if you are looking for touristy main street activities/restaurant. Relatively low key activities/shops along the street that joins the main road.

Wifi doesn't work well throughout our stay

Hot water doesn't work throughout our stay and had to call in maintenance a few times.

// Tips:

Taxi service from the airport is a standard IDR200k (destination: Batu Belig. tell them it's at Seminyak Beach) 

From Akasha Villa to Airport is about IDR100k with decent traffic (I travelled at 8AM)
title: Quiet Corner of Batu Belig

owner_response.text:
Dear Wynne P,

Thank you for taking time to write positive review.  We are so proud that you enjoy your stay and giving a compliment to our staff services. Our goal and commitment are making enjoyable and relaxing stay for our guests. Yes, we provide a drop off shuttle to Seminyak area including Seminyak square for shopping.
Your comment to hot water and wi-fi has resolved by our engineering team. We apologize for the inconvenience but we will always try to ensure all facilities in good condition and running well.
Wish you a great day and we look forward to welcoming you again in the near future.

Thank you and best regards,
All team The Akasha Villas
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
My family stayed at the Akasha Villas. It was our honeymoon, so we were expecting a memorable and unforgettable experience. We were certainly NOT disappointed! A truly luxurious villa hotel, which really does have everything. Spacious and well appointed rooms, world class restaurants and truly amazing staff. 
Loved the short walk to the beach, and to Mozaic Beach Club
If you want true indulgence, then Akasha is for you. 

We will certainly be returning.
title: Pure indulgence!

text: My family and I have stayed the last 10 days in one of the 4 bedroom villas. There was 7 of us plus my 1 yr old son. We all had such a wonderful experience. The staff are all so friendly and very helpful. The morning breakfast is delicious and on the last night we were treated with a bbq which was amazing. The rooms are so clean and the staff are always making your bed and cleaning your room, so the place is immaculate. The facilities are fantastic and we loved swimming in the massive pool and relaxing in the spa. My family and i would highly recommend staying here and can't wait to come back.
title: The best place to stay in Bali

text:
Family of 8 adults and 2 children: Royal 4 Bed Villa.  

Pros: It’s about a 200m walk to the Batu Beliq Beach and about 5-10mins with no traffic to W Hotel, Potatoe Head, Motel Mexicola, Mama San, Eat Street, etc. The Villa is a very good size. The area is up and coming so lots of new restaurants and shops opening around this villa. There is a mini supermarket across the street that caters to your needs. Taxis are easy to come by and you can rent a car/moped easily nearby.  

Cons: Overall the Villa is very tired and needs some maintenance to bring it back to life – note that Bali and in particular this area is equipped with many high standard Villas at this price level and size.  When we stayed the internet simply wasn’t working despite having waited for the villa management to explain that for more than a week I gave up in the end.  

Tips: walk down the beach to the Potatoe Head / Eat Street area if staying at peak season to avoid the traffic. Try going North of the Villa (Canggu and beyond) to see some of the nice beaches in around the area. If staying with kids head to the Canggu Club and try Bounce and the new Water Park – just 5mins away. 

Overall the villa complex is tired and needs some money spent on it.  Negotiate a good price to stay and live with the cons.
title: 4 Bed Royal Villa

owner_response.text:
Thank you for taking your time to review your stay at our villas. Our thank you for highlight about our villa location just a short walk to the beach and some good restaurants nearby our villas. There are also some boutiques, money changers along Batu Belig road.  

We understand your frustration to wifi was not working well during your stay. We have been addressing several complaints to our internet provider and reviewing our contract. As you may know it is very difficult to find good internet provider in Indonesia especially in Bali with guarantee of no trouble internet access all the time. Even previously we had use the best one fiber optic connection too, we found still lack  wifi connection. Again please accept our apologize for trouble of wifi during your stay. 

For the villas, please be informed that we continue and periodically conduct some refurbishment to make our villas facilities meet to the standard and guests exceptions.

Your comment and input are precious for our team and management for us to improve our services level.

If you happen come to Bali in the future, please consider to stay at our villas so we can show you show  our villas refurbishment and services.

Thank you and wish you a great day.
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
The 3 of us arrived and were greeted at reception by Lina. We were shown to Villa 8 and as we stepped through the entrance to the villa we were already smiling. 

The living area was very spacious and clean and the kitchen/dinning room had everything you needed for home cooked meals or room service. 

We booked for three people and were given two villas. 1 king size bed and a twin room. The only problem we had was on the first night with the air con and as soon as we informed the staff the came immediately and fixed it. 

The staff at the villas were brilliant. Breakfast was made each morning for us, the villas were cleaned, beds made, insect repellent sprayed and kitchen cleaned all within an hour!! 

We had an incredibly relaxing holiday and enjoyed the private pool and relaxing environment. This place would be great for families or those wanting a bit of peace and quiet! 

Would definitely recommend this place to others!
title: Little bit of paradise!

text:
My wife and I stayed at the villas with some friends in mid January. We were met at the airport by a very courteous driver who took us promptly to the Akasha Villas where we found all the staff from reception to porters and cleaners to be so friendly and helpful. The Balinese style villa we stayed in and the attached bedrooms were very pleasantly designed with a swimming pool in the centre. In fact, even though we arrived late I could not resist a quick swim before joining our friends in a nearby restaurant. We found the Akasha to be strategically located and after our very enjoyable breakfasts at the nearby Watercress Restaurant, we found all the places we wanted to visit within easy reach. 
In summary a perfect place to stay for family and friends.
title: Perfect Break

text: We booked based on TripAdvisor reviews and we were amazed at how the photos didn't do justice to the property. We stayed in Villa 10. This is the ideal two bedroom villa. We were picked up from airport and driven to the villa without the boring hold up in reception. After a guided tour of the spacious villa we jumped into the private pool. Very comfortable accommodation. Loved open showers. And very courteous staff. We were offered drop offs in Seminyak everyday. We would love to come back anytime.
title: Paradise in Batu Belig

locations.name: The Akasha Luxury Villas & Boutique Hotel
The Akasha Luxury Villas & Boutique Hotel

text: My wife and I stayed at this property just a week after New Year. There are 8 clustered villas, and each cluster consists 3-4 rooms, as well as (spacious) common area (pool, kitchen, dinning room, family room). Everything was ready to use and worked well. The only issue was TV channel and Internet speed. But it was good, so we can communicate more each other :). The service was great, very helpful, and very quick to deliver.
title: Great Villa for your Family in Seminyak, Bali

text:
We stayed in The Akasha Luxury Villa for the weekend. The villa is meticulously designed with elegance and a touch of modern Balinese style. It is a perfect place for family and friends. 

The Akasha staff are exceptionally helpful and friendly. Above all, the cosy & comfy bedroom over looking the swimming pool and the relaxing large bath tub in the bathroom are absolutely superb!

We particularly loved the spacious living room and garden where we had dinner and dance party with friends (see photo). A fun and memorable evening that we will always cherish!
title: Full of Joy

text:
Enjoyed our stay (with some negatives) - we were here for the shoulder period between Christmas and New Year.
Service was great with your typical friendly Balinese hospitality. The staff tried very hard. Place is very spacy and fully equipped.

My criticism of the place was mainly due to the open plan design which meant there were mosquitoes. Place also gets dirty easily (dusty floor) and we found dead fishes on the pond. Probably due to under-staffed?

Overall, great value for money however not very suitable for families with young toddler.
title: Enjoyed our stay

text: I have to admit I am not a traveler yet just last week my family stayed in this private villa for 3D and 2N. We really enjoyed the time there. The room was perfect. The pool was just like playground for all of us, even my mom jumped to the pool and played with my son (I've never seen my mom swum before). The bathroom was just amazing and huge. The crews did their job well. They were always ready when we needed a help.The breakfast was great. Sometimes we just felt reluctant to leave the villa for visiting other places in Bali. No doubt I will recommend people and myself to come here (again).
title: a piece of heaven

owner_response.text:
Dear Mr.Budi,

Glad to know that you and your family had a great time during stay at our villa. We have shared with our team that you enjoy prepared breakfast each morning at your privacy villa by our butler team. All rooms have  ensuite huge bathroom with separate bath tub as well indoor and outdoor shower.

Our villa private swimming pool is one of our favorite facility in each of villa. Our pool villa tile made from natural stone and our staff always keep it clean and clear water.

Yes, our staff is the soul of The Akasha Villas. They will always try to make you and other guests a happy and memorable stay. 

Thank you very much for your kind review. We are looking forward to welcoming you again in the future.
All the best from The Akasha Villas team
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: Thanks to the staff at Akashi villas for a wonderful stay. We have enjoyed your courtesy and friendly staff. Driver was a bonus for short journeys and the villa was close to all shopping and great food. Beautiful sunsets and bars a short walk away. Thanks again.
title: Wonderful stay

locations.name: The Akasha Luxury Villas & Boutique Hotel

text: Our family recently stayed in Akasha Villa 9 for 6 nights. Overall we enjoyed our stay and would recommend Akasha to families with older children. Staff here are very friendly and helpful. You will always be greeted warmly with big smiles. No request is too much trouble and will be dealt with quickly. The villas are spacious with plenty of room for large families. Bathrooms are huge and luxurious, all bedrooms had an ensuite bathroom with large bath and shower and an outside shower. There is also an additional bathroom that is accessible from the living room and pool area with a toilet and shower.Hot water is lacking especially by the afternoon. The location is great if you want to be away from the bustle of central Seminyak, yet close enough for a quick car trip to get to restaurants and shopping. The villa has a car service that will drop you into Seminyak or to close by restaurants or shops for no charge. You will have to catch a taxi back to the villa but this is quite cheap, there are taxi's everywhere so you won't be waiting. The beds are very big and comfortable. Cleaning of the villas is done daily by a team so they are in and out very quickly and efficiently. Floors were quite dirty but swept daily. Room service food other than breakfast is not the best. The set up of the villa is not great for families with toddlers. The bedrooms are separate/pavilion style which means children have to leave the room into the courtyard area with pool to get to parents room. This is quite common for villas in Bali though, although there are a few that have interconnecting rooms. You will need to organise fencing of the pool to keep toddlers safe. The pool was big and the water was clean.
title: Nice spacious villa, great pool

owner_response.text:
Dear Deb S,

Thank you for your generous review for our villas. We were so happy you choose and stayed in one of our villa with your family. It  has been our pride that you found our staff services and facilities beyond your exception. Our villa build and designed to give a privacy for each couple even they came in group and share the same villa. For toddlers, we do recommend our value guests to put pool fence to be erected surround the pool for safety and we can add this facility  without any additional charge. 
Our villa location is approximately 2.5 km from Seminyak shopping and restaurants. However there are some restaurants within walking distance to our villas.

Your experience to our villa dining service except breakfast have shared to our food & beverage team. It is our attention now and  will definitely do some improvement. 

We much appreciated for all your positive feedback and looking forward to welcoming you again at The Akasha Villas in near future. 

Best regards,
The Akasha Villas Management & team
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
We stayed recently at Akasha Villa after our usual accommodation was booked out.  As it was a lot cheaper I was a bit worried but after arriving at the Villas was pleasantly surprised. To the owner of this Villa - your staff are the most friendly, caring and attentive staff that I have ever encountered in Bali.  Nothing was too much trouble and they were constantly striving to make our stay as comfortable as they could!!  The villas themselves were comfortable but unfortunately they could do with a little maintenance and an upgrade.  Also there was no compendium explaining room service, nearby attractions, laundry etc which would have been very useful.  The location was quite out of the way, the address says Seminyak but it is really North Seminyak and not near any shopping or trendy restaurants, it is at least 15-20 minutes taxi drive to the Seminyak Square area and with the traffic as bad as I have seen it, it may take longer.  If you are wanting to stay somewhere more central you may need to reconsider your accommodation.  On the plus side Mozaic Beach Club is a short stroll away and well worth the visit, also Naughty Nuri's Restaurant is in walking distance and really worth a visit.
We stayed in Villa 9 which backed onto the main road, so it was quite noisy and not very relaxing early in the morning hearing motor bikes whizzing by.  So please request a Villa on the beach side if staying here.  We had in-villa massages which were good, however we were massaged on the bed, not quite the same as the fold-out massage tables which are preferable.  The pool area was very nice, they even had pool toys for the kids to use.  Breakfast was cooked in our Villa every morning by the loveliest young ladies, so attentive and they make the most amazing Banana Pancakes ever - so choose the continental to get them!!
So really this is great accommodation which could be absolutely amazing with a few minor changes!!
title: Lovely villa, beautiful staff!!

text:
We have just returned from 8 nights at The Akasha Villas. We were lucky enough to stay in both the three and four bedroom villas. Our three bedroom villa was # 8 and we were very happy to stay here but when we changed to Villa # 12 we were blown away by this villa. From the furnishings to the rooftop spa with a view of the sea. What more can I say except how great the staff are at The Akasha Villas. Nothing was ever a problem. Always going out of the way to please and with a happy smiling face. Breakfast was served each morning in the villa and this was great.
My husband and I would like to thank Komang and the staff at The Akasha Villas for such a relaxing and enjoyable holiday. We are already planning our next holiday to Akasha Villas.
title: Best Villa We Have Stayed In

text:
We loved Akasha! Stayed in Villa 10 in September and they happily put up a temporary pool fence for our 4 year old. Beautiful pavillions with very comfy beds. The in villa cooked breakfast was fantastic every morning and they timed the cleaning for when were went out each day. The staff were second to none, from the reception to the cleaners and maintenance people. Highly recommend. They even made me a birthday cake and surprised us with singing in our villa - not necessary but a lovely thought.
Akasha is 50m from the beach and some really cool beach bars, and they are more than happy to drive you (5 mins) into Seminyak for shopping.
The nicest people in a country full of the nicest people in the world!
title: Nicest People in the World

text: I was under the impression that a large villa would have a lower standard than a 5 star hotel but I was wrong! This villa is a true 5 star quality. Love the bedding and pillows, bathroom and kitchen was luxurious standard too. Felt really comfortable here and great personal butler too! Location was near the beach. After staying at the quiet st regis area, seminyak area seems so close to everything.
title: Impressed..!

text: I am so glad I stayed at Akasha. The villa is very comfortable, spacious and luxurious. I have seen many other villa and by far this is the best I have been to. the fact that it is in a medium sized compound gives the feel of personal touch. The staff are very friendly and helpful as well. Location is perfect for me since I can walk to the quiet beach, stroll along to Potato head beach club, there is also a popular Naughty Nuri's rib restaurant at walking distance. It is close by to major nice restaurants and sites in Seminyak area, but far enough from the distraction of overcrowded streets. I will surely come back!
title: Great villa !

text: The Akasha villa located just north of Seminyak in Batu Belig, Bali is an exceptional villa complex consisting of 12 three and four bedroom villas.  The complex is located at the end of Jl. Batu Belig about 75 meters from the beach.  Anyone who has been to Bali understands the high quality of service provided in most hotels and villas, but the staff at the Akasha redefine the model of quality service and take it to another level.  When you combine the exceptionally high level of service with a near perfect location, along with well appointed villas for a price that goes beyond reasonable you truly have the makings of a memorable holiday in Bali.
title: Simply exceptional

text: A 5 minute walk to the beach only , where we had unblocked view of sunrise & sunset !!  We booked 2-  3 bedroom villa for 3 families with a total of 14 people. We were all very comfortable except for the motorcycle parking lot nearby, which created some disturbance at night !! Otherwise, a very comfortable and spacious villa with friendly and helpful staff !!!
title: Amazing find in Seminyak

text:
The best villas I have ever stayed in after three trips to Bali. Really authentic and traditional Balinese villas. The staff are fantastic and really helpful.

Location is fine for walking to Ku De Ta and La Lucciola along the beach. It is a little distance from the main eat street but taxis are so cheap and hiring a bike is the way to go in Bali.
title: Really classy villas, superb.

text: We stayed at the Akasha Villas with a group of friends, which was perfect. The villa was beautiful, very luxurious and clean. All the rooms had their own bathroom with in- and outside shower/bath. Bathing under a sky of stars was awesome! We had our own private swimming pool, which was great. Service was also great, if requested breakfast/lunch would be cooked and served inside the villa. Also, they would drive us to a restaurant or centre of Seminyak, since the villas were in a more quiet area.
title: Beautiful villas! Great service!

text:
luxury, opulence, extravagance- 

if these are some of the things you are looking for in your getaway, the Akasha Villas in Seminyak delivers in spades! 

Our villa came equipped with a full kitchen, 4 bedrooms and a den bigger than most flats here in Singapore. The service staff was attentive, whipping up full breakfasts in situ for a party of 7 in a matter of minutes, but the jewel in the crown would have to be the swimming pool, why would you need a pool in beach paradise Bali? you ask,  well sometimes its just nice not to be accosted by vendors every 2 minutes while trying to get your tan,

I could keep going but pictures often are able to describe what mere words cannot,  so check out http://www.theakashabali.com/

yes, it really does look like that
title: Palatial accommodations in the heart of Bali

text:
Me and a few friends went to Bali last September and we stayed in Akasha Villa, 
We rented the 4 Bedroom Villa, Stayed there for 5 nights. I was very impressed with the Place and the hospitality of the people, The villa design is very elegant and modern yet still has a Balinese feel to it. Each room was big and has the bathroom almost as big as the room itself, with complete ammentities. The private pool and The living room was very cozy, we were lounging the whole day relaxing hoping that this days wouldn't come to an end, and if you ever wanted to go to the beach you just have to walk 100 meter and you're there on the famous Seminyak beach. I really recommend this place to whoever that comes to Bali,  Amazing experience,  Great deal of price, Thank you Akasha.
Will definitely come book again!!
title: Great experience, unforgettable moments

text:
We moved to Akasha from the dreadful Breezes hotel.  Wow - this place is incredible.  

Beautiful rooms, comfortable beds, friendly staff willing to help out, flat-screen TVs in every room (not that you should be watching TV in this place!), a beautiful pool (not brilliant for laps as there are steps blocking half of it, but still lovely), modern kitchen.

I think we had the worst located villa (quite close to the road, but really not too noisy) but it was still great.

The wi-fi needs to be sorted so that you get better reception in villa 8 (where we stayed).  I'm sure they will fix this over time as they seem to have the right attitude.

The location is not perfect if you need the shops of Seminyak, but it is a short walk from the beach.  If you need to be in on the action, the location might not be right as you would need to take taxis/drive.

For us this was perfect though as we wanted to relax and enjoy the pool, and getting around isn't a problem.  This would be a great place for 3 couples to stay and enjoy a holiday together (unfortunately we were three men on a business trip!).

Highly recommended and would gladly stay here again.
title: Amazing - must be one of the best villas at this price

locations.name: The Akasha Luxury Villas & Boutique Hotel

locations.name: The Akasha Luxury Villas & Boutique Hotel

text:
They had their own characteristic that differs from other villas. I enjoyed every minute being there. We stayed at the four bedroom villa which is very spacious and luxurious. The design and amenities are top standard. Very comfortable bed and pillows, very luxurious bathroom too. Kitchen was very big and well equipped. Service was very personal and warm. We had the special 4 bedroom villa with outdoor jacuzzi, I think it is the only villa with this feature. The top terrace can get a peek of the ocean view and enjoy the sunset.
I have recommended this villa to several friends and they loved it too! The beach is only 100 meters away.
title: Luxurious, warm and spacious

text:
I stayed at Villa Akasha after my wedding celebration in Nusa Dua. My parents booked 2 villas, 4 bedroom for the young people (my sister, my brother, and their spouses, me and my husband, and his friend) and 2 bedroom for the parents.
We got the villa right by the entrance, villa 11 and 12.

Villa 12 is the 4 bedroom with private pool downstairs and rooftop jacuzzi. It's the most beautiful place I've ever stayed at. The rooms are very spacious. I got the master bedroom. The master bathroom is very nice, with a huge bath tub and separate shower, double sinks, and a door that goes straight to the pool. The double door in front of the bed has the view of the pool also. 
My sister bedroom which is across from the master bedroom, has the most unique bathroom, it's half outdoor and half indoor. 

The 2 bedroom upstairs are very nice too. The jacuzzi is awesome, with a small gazebo that I kept using to get massages, overlooking the ocean (that's only 2 minute walk from the villa). It is an amazing experience to stay at this villa.

Villa 11's master bedroom is bigger than my bedroom. The service is great. We got made to order breakfast every morning. My parents and my in laws had the best time at the villa. 
At sunrise and sunset, we would walk to the beach, that's only 2 minute walk. The waves are just amazing. The location is very close to good food, shopping and nightlife.
Overall......I definitely will come back and stay at villa Akasha again.
title: Amazing villa

text: This newly opened villa charmed me in every possible way. Stayed with my friends at the 3 bedrooms villa for 5 nights. We spent a wonderful time there. The villa itself located at Batu Belig, literally short walking distance to a beach (I think you can see the ocean if you stay at the 2 storey villa) and a short minute drive to seminyak area with lots of great restaurants and boutiques. You’ll get your private swimming pool (a huge one), nicely decorated rooms and living room, comfortable bed, great bathroom, and the most luxurious kitchen I’ve ever seen in a villa. The service was very good. They cooked our breakfast in the villa using that marvelous kitchen. The breakfast were great, we try both the Indonesian breakfast and American breakfast. The price was reasonable considering what we got there. Really love this villa and will definitely stay there on our next visit to Bali.
title: Absolutely Stunning!!!
