title: amazing place brilliant service and rooms

text:
The Akasha Villas are located close to the beach in a relatively quiet street away from tourist and shopping precincts. However it is only a short taxi ride into Seminyak for dining and shopping. Often the Akasha car was available which was good. La Barca on the beach is very close and a great spot for drinks on the sand.

My issue with the Akasha is lack of privacy. The staff were friendly but we were interrupted by people calling or entering our villa frequently. Often without knocking and just letting themselves in. It was still happening even once we asked not to be disturbed. There are no Do Not Disturb signs to use. I would not stay here again because  privacy and peace is important to me on a holiday.

Other minor issues which affected our enjoyment:
- the power in our villa went out twice (we were in villa nine - a two bedroom villa)
- breakfast was never provided at our requested time (once it was there before we woke so was cold and awful and other days it was much later than requested which is hard with hungry young children waiting to eat)
- there were loud, noisy roadworks right outside our villa on the first two days and the fumes forced us inside our villa
- my booking for a massage was mishandled and I subsequently did not have one
- when it rained heavily our villa leaked both through the roof and under the doors - had to use all towels plus some to stop leaks. Our toddler slipped all over the place which was quite dangerous.

Overall I cannot recommend the Akasha to any discerning travelers. We have stayed in many better places in Bali. It is a shame as the location is great. I will be looking for other options in the Batu Belig area next time.
title: The Akasha did not quite meet expectations....

owner_response.text:
Dear Anna,

Thank you so much for your kind review. Our apologize concerning minor issues that you and your family have experienced during stay at The Akasha Villas. We do much appreciate for your positive feedback. It has been useful for our team to improve our services and facilities.  We are please to inform you that we have been doing a lot of improvement and fixing the problems as well upgrade the quality services. In the future if you plan for holiday trip to Bali again, we would like to invite you to stay at The Akasha Villas so we can show you our improvement. Thank you and have  a lovely day
Best regards,
komang

text:
Kurz und knapp :

- hervorragende Lage 
- gepflegtes Hotel 
- super freundlicher Service 
- top Preis/Leistung 
- gut ausgestattete Zimmer 
-sauberer Pools 

Nachdem wir in einem anderen Hotel eine schlechte Erfahrung machen mussten, hatten wir uns zuerst entschieden eine Nacht in diesem Hotel zu buchen. Als wir im Hotel ankamen wurden wir sehr freundlich begrüßt und uns wurden Willkommens Getränke zur Verfügung gestellt. Als wir das Zimmer angesehen haben kamen wir vom Staunen nicht heraus, alles war sehr stilvoll eingerichtet und sauber. Wir haben uns sofort dazu entschieden weitere Nächte in diesem Hotel zu verbringen um unseren Urlaub ein schönes Ende zu bereiten. Die Unterkunft macht einen sehr gepflegten Eindruck und es wird viel in die Instandhaltung gesetzt. Wir konnten  zu dem einen Floating Break fast  buchen  und meine Freundin war sehr begeistert. Alle Pools waren sehr sauber :) wir werden diese Unterkunft definitiv unsereren Freunden empfehlen und das nächste mal wenn wir auf Bali sind wieder Buchen! 

Vielen Dank für diesen tollen Aufenthalt !
title: Schöne Unterkunft zwischen Canggu und Seminyak

text: Останавливались в королевской вилле номер 12 на 2 дня после дайвинга. Занимали 3 комнаты. Всего было 4 комнаты и огромная гостиная с кухней. Предложили выбор комнат и после нашего выбора 4-ю закрыли. Вилла отличная. Очень просторные номера. Частный бассейн. Чисто. Немного странные завтраки, небольшой выбор блюд, напитков,  и готовят специально для Вас у Вас же в гостиной/кухне . Долго, но в целом вкусно и нормально. До океана максимум 5 минут пешком, близко. Обратите внимание, что в океане в этом районе, как и в большинстве мест на Бали, несмотря на огромные песчаные пляжи, купаться и плавать очень сложно, детям практически невозможно из за больших волн, приливов/отливов, морских водорослей. Такие места хороши только для сёрфинга.
title: Отличная резиденция

text: 객실은 넓고 좋았는데 청결 상태가 조금 아쉽네요. 에어콘도 밤에는 시원하지만 낮에는 그냥 더운 기운만 없애줄 정도 이구요 풀도 제법큽니다 위치는 조금 멀어서 저희는 오토바이를 빌려서 5분정도 타고 가야 스미냑 센터에 갈수 있었습니다. 바로 앞에 편의점이 있어서 그건 편했어요, 저희는 3베드룸 풀빌라에 있었는데 조금 오래되서인지 고장이난 부분들이 조금씩 있어서 불편하긴 했지만 그래도 조용하게 지낼수 있습니다. 아침은 나름 초이스가 있는데 그다지 맛있거나 하진 않아요 직원분들은 친절은 한데 언어소통이 너무 어려운 단점이 있습니다.그래도 다음에 한번 더 가고 싶은 큰 빌라 였습니다.
title: 꽤 괜찮은 호텔이었습니다

text:
我們在Akasha住了5個晚上，訂的是4房的villa，我不得不說我有點兒失望。
首先，入住時發現4個房間的浴缸止水閥門”全”都是壞的，向旅館人員反應，他們只攤攤手（然後什麼事也不做），然後有2個房間的戶外淋浴間落水頭也是壞的。
再來，我覺得打掃人員並不用心，入住的時候，除了主要區域，很多角落都没有整理（比如沐浴乳拿起來底下的磁磚厚厚一層灰，應該根本没拿起來清過？），而且備品也常忘了補充，或要叫了才會補。
再來說說優點。
櫃台小姐的笑容可掬有耐心，值得鼓勵。
游泳池很大，是真的可以游的，深度約一米五，我們游得很開心。
客廰也很大，我覺得設計得不錯，感覺很悠閑。
然後離海邊很近（雖然海邊並不太乾淨）。
其實Akasha villa設計得很大氣，我相信原本真的是一間很棒的旅店，但是感覺業主没有用心在經營。
不過這間飯店的價格對預算有限的人來說，真的是很有競爭力。所以可以如果以上這些都是你可以接受的，那就去吧！
title: “過去是一個很不錯的地方，但現在.....
